item.title: CHARLES COLVARD LTD 10-K
item.description: CHARLES COLVARD LTD, which is in the Jewelry, Silverware & Plated Ware [3910] industry, SEC 10-K filing on September 03, 2021 had 37860 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: june - 352 instances company - 339 instances 2021 - 330 instances 30 - 326 instances moissanite - 256 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
